Body:
"""Test clustering function."""
train_features, train_targets, test_features, test_targets = self.get_data()
cf = cluster_features(train_matrix=train_features, train_target=
    train_targets, test_matrix=test_features, test_target=test_targets, k=2)
self.assertTrue(len(cf['train_features']) == 2)
self.assertTrue(len(cf['train_target']) == 2)
self.assertTrue(len(cf['test_features']) == 2)
self.assertTrue(len(cf['test_target']) == 2)
